# Quarto Reports Generator Environment Configuration Template
# Copy this file to .env and update the paths for your system

# Python executable path (required)
# Find your Python installation and update this path
PYTHON_EXE=C:\Path\To\Python\python.exe

# Quarto CLI executable path (required)
# Contact IT for installation location
QUARTO_EXE=C:\Path\To\Quarto\bin\quarto.exe

# Typst executable path (optional, for advanced formatting)
# Contact IT for installation location if needed
TYPST_EXE=C:\Path\To\Typst\typst.exe

# Project directories (automatically set, can be customized)
PROJECT_ROOT=C:\Users\Internet\Desktop\quarto-reports
QUARTO_REPORTS_DATA=C:\Users\Internet\Desktop\quarto-reports\data
QUARTO_REPORTS_OUTPUT=C:\Users\Internet\Desktop\quarto-reports\reports

# Optional: Custom Python package paths
# Uncomment and set if you have Python packages in non-standard locations
# PYTHONPATH=C:\Path\To\Custom\Packages

# Optional: Custom temporary directory
# TEMP_DIR=C:\Users\Internet\Desktop\quarto-reports\temp

# Optional: Logging configuration
# LOG_LEVEL=INFO
# LOG_FILE=C:\Users\Internet\Desktop\quarto-reports\logs\generator.log

# Instructions:
# 1. Copy this file to .env
# 2. Update the paths above to match your system
# 3. Test with: .\validate-setup.ps1
# 4. Generate reports with: .\run-reports.ps1
